titles.title: I Am Crucified With Jesus (litlle work nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh it is so sweet To die with Jesus To the world and self and sin Oh it is so sweet To live with Jesus As He lives and reigns within{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am crucified with Jesus And the cross hath set me free I have ris'n again with Jesus And He lives and reigns in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mystery hid from ancient ages But at length to faith made plain Christ in me the Hope of Glory Tell it o'er and o'er again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This the secret nature hideth Summer dies and lives again Spring from winter's grave ariseth Harvest grows from buried grain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This the secret of the holy Not our holiness but Him O Lord empty us and fill us With Thy fullness to the brim{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This the balm for pain and sickness Just to all our strength to die And to find His life and fullness All our being's need supply{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This the story of the Master Through the Cross He reached the Throne And like Him our path to glory Ever leads through death alone{/lang-eng}
